titles.title: The Children Of Israel Marched Around The City

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The children of Israel marched around the city,
Marched around the city, marched around the city.
The children of Israel marched around the city,
Seven times they marched around the walls of Jericho.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Glory to God! they shouted together,
And down came the walls of Jericho.
Glory to God! they shouted together,
And down came the walls of Jericho.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh, my precious brother, beset by many problems,
As tall and as wide as the walls of Jericho.
Oh, my precious brother, beset by many problems,
As tall and as wide as the walls of Jericho.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Glory to God! Let us shout together,
As down come the walls of Jericho.
Glory to God! Let us shout together,
As down come the walls of Jericho.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Los israelitas le dieron siete vueltas
le dieron siete vueltas, le dieron siete vueltas.
Los israelitas le dieron siete vueltas
A Jericó

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
/¡Gloria a Dios! Gritaron todos
cayeron los muros de Jericó. / (2)

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
/Hermano querido
que tienes tantas pruebas
que son como los de Jericó. / (2)

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
/¡Gloria a Dios! Podrás gritar
caerán los muros del corazón. / (2)
